name: express-scaffolding
description: ## Setup 1. Install [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/)  1. (project folder) 1. Open bash and `cd` into the project folder (if you're on Windows, you can for example use [Git Bash](https://git-scm.com/download/win) as a shell) 1. run `npm install -D typescript`

scripts.publishheroku: cd ../../../ && git subtree push --prefix Project/ESE-2018-Scaffolding-master/backend ese-t1-express master || true
